verbs.description: asian turkey lettuce cups such a cool idea for a light lunch or even [ARG2: an appetizer] [ARGM-ADV: simply] [V: served] [ARG1: in small lettuce leaves] when i want to make it easier for my kids to eat i mix it all up with shredded lettuce and serve in a bowl —diana rios lytle texas turkey
